results.definition: an explanation of something that is not immediately obvious
examples: often imitations are extended to provide a more accurate rendition of the child's intended meaning

results.definition: the act of interpreting something as expressed in an artistic performance
examples: her rendition of Milton's verse was extraordinarily moving

results.definition: a performance of a musical composition or a dramatic role etc.
examples: they heard a live rendition of three pieces by Schubert

results.definition: handing over prisoners to the country in which a crime was committed
